description: This file defines a Java class called NetworkHealthProblemEvent which extends another class Event. It appears to be part of a mock Zigbee core event system, representing a specific network health problem event.

classes.name: NetworkHealthProblemEvent
classes.description: A class representing a network health problem event in a Zigbee core mock system, extending the base Event class.
